Title: Art & Lies.
Subtitle: A Piece for Three Voices and a Bawd.
Authors: Jeanette Winterson.
Categories: Fiction.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=0K-vmAEACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: On a high-speed train hurtling through the near future, three passengers come together--Handel, an ex-priest-turned-surgeon whose humanity is sacrificed to intellect; Picasso, an outcast woman comforted only by her painting; and Sappho, the lesbian poet.
